common_patterns.bug_fix_pattern: 1. Reproduce the issue 2. Identify root cause 3. Implement minimal fix 4. Add regression test 5. Verify fix works 6. Check for side effects
common_patterns.feature_implementation_pattern: 1. Understand all requirements 2. Design the solution 3. Implement incrementally 4. Test each component 5. Integrate components 6. Verify acceptance criteria 7. Add comprehensive tests 8. Update documentation
